description:
Kondou Masami is a 45-year-old manager of a http://anidb.net/ch95364 [family restaurant]. A kind, timid man, he is often criticized by his employees for being too weak. He is divorced and has a young son named http://anidb.net/ch95351 [Yuuto]. He is initially rather intimidated by http://anidb.net/ch93199 [Akira], whom he assumes actually hates him, while she, in fact, is merely staring at him in love.
He is a fan of "Pure Literature" and loves reading books. Prior to becoming a restaurant manager, he wrote novels alongside his former college buddy and now-renowned writer http://anidb.net/ch95360 [Kujou Chihiro].
Source: Wikipedia
name: Kondou Masami
